content: स्फुर् {c6c} <ab>P.</ab> (स्फुरति, स्फुरित) {@--1@} ({%a%}) To throb, palpitate (as eyes &c.); शांतमिदमाश्रमपदं स्फुरति च बाहुः कुतः फलमिहास्य <ls>Ś. 1. 16</ls>; स्फुरता वामकेनापि दाक्षिण्यमवलंब्यते <ls>Māl. 1. 8</ls>; अभिमतफलशंसी चारु पुस्फोर वाहुः <ls>Bk. 1. 27</ls> ({%b%}) To shake, tremble, quiver, vibrate in general; स्फुरदधरनासापुटतया <ls>U. 1. 29</ls>, <ls n="U.">6. 33.</ls> {@--2@} To twitch, struggle, become agitated; हतं पृथिव्यां करुणं स्फुरंतं <ls>Rām.</ls> {@--3@} To start, dart, spring forward; पुस्फुरुर्वृषभाः परं <ls>Bk. 14. 6.</ls> {@--4@} To spring back, rebound (as a bow.) {@--5@} To spring or break forth, shoot out, spring up, rise forth; धर्मतःस्फुरति निर्मलं यशः; <ls>Ku. 3. 68.</ls> {@--6@} To start into view, become visible or manifest, appear clearly, become displayed; मुखात्स्फुरंतीं को हर्तुमिच्छति हरेः परिभूय दंष्ट्रां <ls>Mu. 1. 8</ls>; रचितरुचिरभूषां ट्टष्टिमोषे प्रदोषे स्फुरति निरवसादां कापि राधां जगाद <ls>Gīt. 11.</ls> {@--7@} To flash, scintillate, sparkle, glitter, gleam, shine; स्फुरतु कुचकुंभयोरुपरि मणिमंजरी रंजयेतु तव हृदयश <ls>Gīt. 10</ls>; (तया) स्फुरत्प्रभामंडलया च, काशे <ls>Ku. 1. 24</ls>, <ls>R. 3. 60</ls>, <ls n="R.">5. 51.</ls> <ls>Me. 15</ls>, <ls n="Me.">27.</ls> {@--8@} To shine, distinguish oneself, become eminent; <ls>Pt. 1. 27.</ls> {@--9@} To flash on the mind, rush suddenly into memory. {@--10@} To go tremulously. {@--11@} To bruise, destroy. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (स्फारयति-ते|स्फोरयतिते) {@--1@} To cause to throb or vibrate. {@--2@} To cause to shine, irradiate. {@--3@} To throw, cast. --WITH अप to shine forth or out. --अभि {1} to spread or be diffused, expand. {2} to become known.
